auth.tagline: Digital tool for your housing company
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.inviteCodeSubtitle: Enter the invite code you received to register as a housing company representative.
auth.inviteCodeMinLength: Invite code must be at least 6 characters
auth.residentInviteCodeSubtitle: Enter the resident invite code you received from your housing company
auth.residentInviteCodeMinLength: Resident invite code must be at least 8 characters
auth.selectInviteTypeSubtitle: Select which type of invite you received.
auth.residentRegistrationComplete: Welcome to TaloFix! You can now log in.
auth.orJoinWithCode: Or register with an invite code
auth.registrationCompleteMessage: Your account has been created successfully! You can now log in.
auth.welcomeHousingCompany: Welcome {{name}}! You can now log in.
auth.managementInviteCodeSubtitle: Enter the property manager invite code you received from the housing company
auth.managingThisCompany: You will manage this housing company
auth.managementRegistrationComplete: Welcome to TaloFix! You can now log in as a property manager.
auth.serviceCompanyInviteCodeSubtitle: Enter the service company invite code you received from the housing company
auth.servicingThisCompany: You will service this housing company
auth.serviceCompanyRegistrationComplete: Welcome to TaloFix! You can now log in as a service company.

faults.title: Fault Reports
faults.closeConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this fault report?
faults.deleteImageConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this image?
faults.statusErrorPermission: You do not have permission to change the fault report status.
faults.statusErrorTransition: The status cannot be changed at this time.

statusError.permission: You do not have permission to change the fault report status.
statusError.transition: The status cannot be changed at this time.
statusError.generic: Something went wrong while changing the status.

statusConfirm.title: Confirm status change
statusConfirm.cancelBody: Are you sure you want to cancel this fault report?
statusConfirm.notPossibleBody: Are you sure you want to mark this report as not possible?

faults.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least {{min}} characters
faults.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be at most {{max}} characters
faults.imageBase64Missing: Image processing failed. Please select the image again.
faults.imageProcessingFailed: Image compression failed. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage housing companies
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Here you can manage housing companies and their invite codes.

admin.createCompanySubtitle: Fill in the housing company details. The company will register using an invite code.
admin.noCompanies: No housing companies. Create your first company to get started.
admin.noInviteCode: No invite code. Generate a code to share with the housing company.
admin.inviteCodeMessage: Welcome to TaloFix! Use the invite code below to register.
admin.inviteCodeInstructions: Open the TaloFix app and select 'Join with Invite Code'. Enter the code: {{code}}
admin.inviteCodeInfo: The invite code is valid for 7 days. Share it with the housing company representative.
admin.companyCreatedSuccess: Housing company created! Generate an invite code and share it with the company.
admin.deleteCompanyWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this company?
admin.deleteCompanyMessage: This action will permanently delete the housing company. This cannot be undone.

dashboard.title: My Page
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to TaloFix
dashboard.welcomeMessage: From here you can report faults in your apartment and track the status of your fault reports.
dashboard.welcomeCreateMessage: From here you can report a new fault in your apartment.
dashboard.deleteAccountMessage: This will delete your account, login credentials, and all your fault reports. This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.name: Name
dashboard.faultReportsHelper: View and edit your fault reports

dashboard.title: Housing Company Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to TaloFix
dashboard.welcomeMessage: From here you can manage fault reports, announcements and residents.
dashboard.faultReportsComingSoon: Fault report management coming soon. In the future, you will be able to view and manage all fault reports here.
dashboard.announcementsComingSoon: Announcement management coming soon. In the future, you will be able to create and manage announcements for residents here.

residents.title: Residents
residents.createInviteSubtitle: Create an invite code for a resident. Enter building and apartment number.
residents.inviteCodeInfo: The invite code is valid for 7 days. Share it with the resident.
residents.inviteCodeMessage: Welcome to TaloFix! Use the invite code below to register as a resident.
residents.inviteCodeInstructions: Open the TaloFix app and select 'Join with Invite Code'. Enter the code: {{code}}
residents.noInviteCodes: No invite codes. Create an invite code to invite a resident.
residents.noBuildings: No buildings. Create an invite code to add residents.
residents.deleteInviteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this apartment?
residents.deleteInviteMessage: This action will permanently delete the apartment and all related data. If a resident has registered for this apartment, their account and fault reports will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

management.inviteManagerSubtitle: Create an invite code for property manager. Only one property manager can exist at a time.
management.generateNewCodeDescription: Create an invite code for property manager. You can only create one at a time.
management.inviteCodeMessage: Welcome to TaloFix! Use the invite code below to register as property manager.
management.inviteCodeInstructions: Open the TaloFix app and select 'Join with Invite Code'. Enter the code: {{code}}
management.inviteCodeInfo: The invite code is valid for 7 days. Share it with the property manager.
management.getError: Failed to fetch property manager information
management.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the property manager? This will delete their account and all invites.

serviceCompany.inviteServiceCompanySubtitle: Create an invite code for service company. Only one service company can exist at a time.
serviceCompany.generateNewCodeDescription: Create an invite code for service company. You can only create one at a time.
serviceCompany.inviteCodeMessage: Welcome to TaloFix! Use the invite code below to register as service company.
serviceCompany.inviteCodeInstructions: Open the TaloFix app and select 'Join with Invite Code'. Enter the code: {{code}}
serviceCompany.inviteCodeInfo: The invite code is valid for 7 days. Share it with the service company.
serviceCompany.getError: Failed to fetch service company information
serviceCompany.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the service company? This will delete their account and all invites.
